name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, a video went viral online. In the video, security guards tried to detain the old man's tricycle. The old man had no choice but to kneel down and beg them for mercy, saying, "Dad, I'm 85 years old, please spare my life."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 14, Henan. The Internet reported that Henan Polytechnic University banned students from riding bicycles. A student was stopped by security guards when he went out on a bicycle, and a physical conflict broke out between the two sides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Weinan, Shaanxi. Construction work at Jinqiao Coal Mine in Heyang damaged villagers’ houses, and villagers used their bodies to block the forklifts from moving forward, during which time disputes and shoving broke out between the two sides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Nanhua Temple incident continues to ferment.
On November 15, the Qujiang District Party Committee's Internet Information Office called the person who filmed the video and asked him to contact overseas media to delete the video on the grounds that it involved a religious incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, the Chinese Consulate in Germany said that it had arrested a 43-year-old Chinese suspect in a serial rape case. The man pretended to be a woman and went to the victim's residence under the pretext of renting a house through platforms such as Xiaohongshu and WeChat to rape her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, the police reported that five attackers from the China Railway Seventh Engineering Group Co., Ltd. project department were detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 14, Tianjin.
A group of elderly people who lost their only child protested in front of the Tianjin Health Supervision Office that the government did not implement the pension policy for families who lost their only child.
They held up signs that read "It's good to have only one child left, the government will take care of the elderly", shouted slogans such as "Family Planning Commission, big liar" and "Today in Tianjin, tomorrow in Beijing", and posted signs on their bodies that read "It's not a crime to lose your only child, and it's reasonable to petition."
